panels.description:
Global statistics from the chain, all nodes that are caught up should have the same value.

If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Participating voting power % in last 100 rounds

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: count(aptos_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} > 0)

count(aptos_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} <= 0)

panels.title: #nodes proposing perfectly within reputation window

targets.expr: count(aptos_data_client_highest_advertised_data{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", data_type="transactions"}  - on(kubernetes_pod_name,role) aptos_state_sync_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"telemetry-service",kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"validator", type="synced"} > 30000)  OR on() vector(0)

aptos_state_sync_version{type="synced", chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.description: The current round consensus is at, the rate of this is roughly Committed blocks per sec.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_current_round{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Round

panels.description: The current epoch number the node is in, the number is bumped with reconfiguration event like key rotation, validator set change etc.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_epoch{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: The rate of the committed transaction version.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_version{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Committed successful txns per sec

panels.description: The average number of transactions of a block, can impact the execution time and overall latency.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_num_txns_per_block_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_consensus_num_txns_per_block_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Transactions per block

panels.description: The rate of the committed round number.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_last_committed_round{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Committed blocks per sec

panels.description: Average size of consensus blocks pulled from mempool

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_transactions_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="get_block", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_service_transactions_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", type="get_block", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: User transactions per block (by proposer)

panels.description: Average size in bytes of consensus blocks pulled from mempool

targets.expr: rate(aptos_mempool_service_bytes_get_block_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval]) / rate(aptos_mempool_service_bytes_get_block_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Bytes per block (by proposer)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_error_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.description: Rate of inserted transactions per ranking score bucket

targets.expr: max by (role, bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_ranking_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="insert"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Inserted transactions by gas price bucket

panels.description: Rate of consensus pulled transactions per ranking score bucket

targets.expr: sum by (role, bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_ranking_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="consensus_pulled"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Transactions pulled by gas price bucket

panels.description: The time between Mempool receiving the transaction and time to be committed.

targets.expr: sum by (role, bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval])) / sum by (role, bucket) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_txn_commit_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", stage="commit_accepted"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Per Bucket Avg E2E Txn Commit Latency

targets.expr: sum by (role) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_gc_latency_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", type="client_expiration",}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (role) (rate(aptos_core_mempool_removed_txns_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Participating in consensus in leader election window (either voted in last num_validators rounds, or proposed in last 10*num_validators rounds)

targets.expr: clamp_max(aptos_committed_votes_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} + aptos_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}, 1)

panels.title: Participating in consensus

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: aptos_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} / clamp_min(aptos_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} + aptos_committed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}, 1)

panels.title: Proposal failure rate

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: aptos_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Proposal failure count (in window)

panels.description: Voting power of all votes for the same ledger info collected by a proposer

targets.expr: rate(aptos_proposer_collected_most_voting_power_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(aptos_proposer_collecting_round_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: collected voting power for proposal

panels.description: Voting power of all votes for all other (conflicting) ledger infos collected by a proposer

targets.expr: rate(aptos_proposer_collected_conflicting_voting_power_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(aptos_proposer_collecting_round_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: collected voting power for conflicting

panels.description: Voting power of timeout votes collected by a proposer

targets.expr: rate(aptos_proposer_collected_timeout_voting_power_sum{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/rate(aptos_proposer_collecting_round_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$__rate_interval])/aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: collected voting power for timeout votes

panels.description:
Global statistics from the chain, all nodes that are caught up should have the same value.

If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_10_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_30_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_voting_power_last_300_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Participating voting power % in consensus

panels.description:
Global statistics from the chain, all nodes that are caught up should have the same value.

If value goes below 80 it is concerning. if it goes below 72 it is a very bad.

It cannot go below 67%, because chain stops otherwise, and there is no data to show then.

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_10_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_30_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_100_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

quantile(0.5, aptos_chain_health_participating_num_validators_last_300_rounds{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} * 100/aptos_chain_health_total_num_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"})

panels.title: Participating nodes % in consensus

panels.description: Proposal failure rate in leader election window. Value goes back to 0 once node is not asked to propose at all in the window

targets.expr: aptos_failed_proposals_in_window{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Average proposal failure count (in window)

panels.description: The duration of a single round until it generates local timeout.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_round_timeout_s{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Current Round timeout value

panels.description: The total number of rounds that have timeout certificate.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_timeout_rounds_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Timeout rounds per sec

panels.description: Number of validators for the current epoch.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_current_epoch_validators{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Number of validators

panels.description: Total voting power of the current epoch.

targets.expr: aptos_total_voting_power{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Total voting power

panels.description: Pending blocks in the block tree.

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_num_blocks_in_tree{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"} - 1

panels.title: Pending blocks

panels.description: Pending blocks in the pipeline

targets.expr: aptos_consensus_num_blocks_in_pipeline{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}

panels.title: Pending blocks in pipeline

targets.expr: consensus_gauge{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role", op="back_pressure"}

panels.description: The proposal rate of the node, indicating how many times it becomes leaders.

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_proposals_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[$interval])

panels.title: Proposals rate

panels.description: The total number the node votes on a NIL block when the round timeout. (when the proposer doesn't send proposal in time).

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_vote_nil_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", cluster=~"$cluster", metrics_source=~"$metrics_source", namespace=~"$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", role=~"$role"}[1m])

panels.title: Nil block per sec
